import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Field, Form, Formik} from "formik"; import "../../../css/form.css" import * as FacilityService from "../../../service/FacilityService" function FacilityCreate() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ "name": "", "usageArea": 0, "rentalCost": 0, "maxGuest": 0, "rentalTypeId": 1 }); const [rentalTypes, setRentalTypes] = useState([]); const getALlRentalType = async () => { let temp = await FacilityService.getAllRentalType(); set } return (
) } export default FacilityCreate;
